channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Goldman funds take $900 million hit on Northvolt, FT says
item.description: “While we are one of many investors disappointed by this outcome, this was a minority investment through highly diversified funds."

item.title: The Democrats Are in Trouble. This Man Can Save Them.
item.description: The theories of the 20th-century philosopher John Rawls can inspire a new way for Democrats to find relevance.

item.title: Trump names Rollins as agriculture secretary, rounding out Cabinet nominations
item.description: Rollins is a longtime Trump associate who served as White House domestic policy chief during his first presidency.

item.description: “Laapataa Ladies” and “All We Imagine as Light” have both captivated audiences at home. But only one was able to get India’s nod for the best foreign ...

item.title: Wealthy polluters to pay $300 billion a year after bitter negotiations at COP29
item.description: The final deal commits developed nations to pay at least $300 billion a year by 2035 to help developing countries green their economies and prepare fo...

item.title: Madeleine Riffaud, ‘the Girl Who Saved Paris,’ Dies at 100
item.description: Humiliated by a Nazi officer as a teenager, she joined the French Resistance. By the time she was 20, she had killed a German soldier, survived tortur...

item.title: After Trump’s Project 2025 denials, he is tapping its authors and influencers for key roles
item.description: Trump has tapped Russell Vought for an encore at OMB, Tom Homan as "border czar," and immigration hardliner Stephen Miller as deputy chief of policy.

item.title: Gen Zers’ definition of financial success includes joining the top 1% — and they’re really confident about making it
item.description: Gen Zers on average believe an annual salary of $587,797 and net worth of $9.47 million are needed when they envision "financial success."

item.title: Taiwan Is Ready to Defend Democracy. Is Trump With Us?
item.description: Many Americans voted for border security. Try living right across from China.
